general_info.summary: This text lists various Amity University campuses across India and internationally, including locations like Noida, Lucknow, Jaipur, Gurgaon, Mumbai, and Dubai. It also mentions specific sectors in Gurgaon and Vasundhara, along with Amity University Online and Amity University Press. The content highlights various programs such as Computer Science/IT, Psychology, Data Sciences, Political Science, Sociology, and vocational degrees (B.Voc) in Building Construction Technology, Power Distribution Management, and Refrigeration/Air Conditioning, as well as a Diploma in Electronic Manufacturing Services. It also details scholarship opportunities, mentions "ADMISSION OPEN 2025", and includes information about recognized bodies like RCI, Ph.D. scholars, and registered scholarship details.
